text: Small igloo, with some snow artists, sculptors and carvers.
Small frost tower, with some ice mages inside, they are not exactly talented, but hey they can at least build a snowman, so that's something.
Relatively decent Ice Tower and mages inside are not bad, well they are not good either, their latest invention "Snowball Gun" is as useless as it sounds.
Proper Frozen Spire, filled with master mages who can unleash mighty ice spells, or at least they claim they can, but no one has really seen them do it.
Small fort of ice drakes and knights with small wing for Unseelie ambasadors.
Decent Ice Castle with garrison of knights and some visitors from Unseelie court.
Winter Palace is home to greatest knights and dragons of frozen tundra as well as to some of the best Unseelie warriors.
